titleStmt.title: Great news from Ireland being a full and true relation of the several great & successful defeats which the Danish and Inniskilling forces hath lately obtained over a party of the Irish rebels at Cliff and Emismack &c. : as also of the present distractions betwixt the French and Irish : with the substance of the late King James's letter to his Queen in France.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.H. and W. Faulkner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
